Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Love KSP and can't stop playing it. This game incorporates two things I have loved all my life, LEGOS and Space Travel. Started with .19 at the end of May and I have gone from "How will I learn or use all of theses stock parts?" to "MODS MODS MODS!". I love the mods for this game, each one adds a whole new layer of game play. I also love the education content in the game, I'm 48 and my 8 year old and me learned about apoapsis and periapsis the same time because of this game. I'm a big believer in the coming man/tech singularity (http://singularity.com/) and the promise of abundance (http://www.abundancethebook.com/) it brings and one of the key things to bring this about is making education more like games, addicting and fun.

I would say more but need to get back to the game

Thanks,

Sean
Welcome! It's pretty much one of the greatest games out, isn't it?
